title: ranked stats
body: is there a reason we can't look at ranked stats yet or is it just me?

replies.body: Just use an external website like op.gg
Yes I know this but was wondering why the one in client isn't working yet.

> [{quoted}](name=Princess Yaia,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0FRvZoFf,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-09T01:39:03.872+0000)
>
> Just use an external website like op.gg

Sites are showing Season 6 stats mixed with Preseason so we can't see what's actually going on.
